description: A weathered tunnel opens to rugged plains, golden grasses swaying beneath a breeze. Ruins and hidden paths await discovery.
name: Tunnel

story_actions.story_text: You step out from the mirrored tunnel — reborn, but unsteady. Something about the air feels... known. A breeze brushes past.
A figure appears ahead. Still. Perfect. Your breath catches — not from fear, but reverence. You blink, and the figure is closer. You try to move, but your body disobeys.

The figure meets your gaze. No words — only light and silence. A warmth settles in your chest, and then, they vanish.

You are alone again... but changed.

You emerge once more into wind and golden grass. But this time, the presence you remember — the still figure of light — is nowhere to be found. You wait. Nothing.

You wonder: will it return? Or was it never truly there?
Lift a stone. Your muscles strain against the weight — it moves, just barely.
Touch the rough bark of a nearby gnarled oak tree.
Observe small creatures darting through the tall grass.
Rest beneath the shade of the oak trees.
Search for hidden objects or tracks.
Meditate under the ancient oak tree.
A rat scurries toward you, teeth bared and eyes gleaming in the dim light. You prepare to defend yourself.
